column5: I have a 2000 25 hp merc 4 stroke bigfoot.  I have changed the oil on it  year in year out, but for some reason  this year i forgot how much oil i need.  Brain fart i guess?   I have the boat stored up north and i wanted to grab the oil this weekend and go up and get'er done.    I could ask the guy at the parts counter but i dont wanna look like an  lol    Thanks in advance

I can't imagine it's more than the litre bottle for the bottom end. I just did my 9.9 = 380ml and my 275 = 800 ml.  Engine itself.. 9.9 = 800ml and my 275 takes 7 litres of expensive stuff...can't imagine the 25 being more than 2 or 3 litres. Will see what I can find.  Good guess... 2 litres  http://answers.yahoo.com/question/index?qi...19204054AAFaZNo
my 90 merc on takes 600 ml of oil very little a bottle should do
I would just ask the dealer thats why hes there ,no reason to feel like and
Are you talking aboot the engine oil or the foot dope?
sorry folks engine oil................ ive been looking online cant find it........ For some reason  3L  rings a bell
i think the 1999-2000 model  is different............ dont quote me on that
Sorry, but I just had to do it!!!  Heck! Pick up a half dozen litres, it never hurts to have a couple bottles of oil on hand.
maybe i will just pick up a barrel and use it for my truck too lol
I have a 2003 25 Merc 4 stroke big foot.  You need 3 bottles of 4 stroke oil (1L type)  You will also want to replace the plugs if you do lots of trolling.  Thanks
